title: RGB Theory
guide:
### Additive Mix (Light)
Sum of Red (R), Green (G), Blue (B).

#### Key Mixes
| Color 1 | Color 2 | Result |
| :--- | :--- | :--- |
| Red | Green | **Yellow** |
| Red | Blue | **Magenta** |
| Green | Blue | **Cyan** |
| R+G+B | - | **White** |

#### Hex
* **#FF0000**: Pure Red
* **#00FF00**: Pure Green
* **#0000FF**: Pure Blue
